creator: pierre.delisle@sun.com
text:
Manager webapp fails with nightly of 2003-03-18

Caused by: java.util.MissingResourceException: Can't find bundle for base name
org.apache.catalina.manager.LocalStrings, locale en_US
	at java.util.ResourceBundle.throwMissingResourceException(ResourceBundle.java:804)
I can run the manager without any problem now (04/16). Likely a build system issue.
creator: remm@apache.org
